table.name: UP_CHANNEL_MDATA
table.desc: Holds the meta data of UP_CHANNEL

column.name: CHAN_ID
column.desc: Channel ID is a unique sequence number generated by the portal - primary key, see UP_SEQUENCE

column.name: LOCALE
column.desc: Locale - the locale of meta data element

column.name: CHAN_TITLE
column.desc: Channel title - it appears at the top title bar of the channel

column.name: CHAN_NAME
column.desc: Channel name - used for display name of channel for subscribe, usually the same as title

column.name: CHAN_DESC
column.desc: Channel description - provides additional information to the user about the channel to help him or her select a channel to subscribe to
